title: OBSCENE BOT NAME
body:
My friend and I were playing an Aram game one day and we met a certain bot. His name was %%%%%... 
Riot discourages Obscene summoner names while a bot gets %%%%%? what is going on?

ps: it was %%%%%

replies.body: Report for offensive name and move on.
Does Reporting a bot actually work, i've done it a couple times and nothing has changed

While it may not seem that your reports are doing anything, they are!

Please continue to report these players, especially if you believe they may be bot accounts.

For this case specifically I would report the Player for Offensive Summoner Name and Cheating (If you're sure they're a bot that is).
